[Report]: https://github.com/HelpAPaw/Flutter/security/advisories

# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Support     |
| ------- | ----------- |
| > 0.2.0 | Supported   |
| = 0.2.0 | Supported   |
| < 0.2.0 | Unsupported |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

[Report Vulnerability][Report]
